===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Dali]] (大理[[古城]]), a [[small]] [[town]] ([[now]] a [[major]] [[tourist]] [[destination]]) in [[Yunnan]], [[China]].
# {{lb|zh|geography}} [[Xiaguan]] (大理[[市]]), the [[larger]] [[nearby]] [[seat of government]] and [[industrial]] [[center]] which [[grew up]] along the [[road]]s to the [[old]] [[town]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Dali]] [[kingdom|Kingdom]] (大理[[國]]), a [[medieval]] [[state]] [[control]]led from the [[old]] [[town]].
# {{lb|zh|historical|_|geography}} [[Dali]] [[prefecture|Prefecture]] (大理[[府]]), the [[hinterland]] [[control]]led by the [[old]] [[town]] under [[imperial]] [[China]].
